Home.donationDescription:
Hi everyone.
As most of you know, but to some this may be new too.
Our son Jay was diagnosed with a grade 4 Glioblastoma brain tumour back in September 2021 at the young age of just 19 years old.
He underwent emergency surgery to remove it but sadly this wasnâ€™t enough.

This led to him having to have radiotherapy,
& 19 months of chemotherapy to which this took a massive toll on not only his body but also on Jay as a person.
